title: Expense Tracker
description: Built a full-stack Expense Tracker using MERN stack. Gained hands-on experience with JWT authentication and secure CRUD operations.

title: Shopping Cart
description: Gained hands-on experience with Redux Toolkit, especially createAsyncThunk, for handling async data from the Fake Store API.

title: Dashboard UI
description: Built a responsive admin dashboard using React and Tailwind CSS, learning component structure, layout design, and responsiveness.

title: Social Media SPA
description: Built a React.js SPA using Context API for global state and React Router for navigation. Implemented CRUD operations with Axios and real time search.
